aspects.name: Combo
aspects.damage:
1st Strike: 25 Damage

2nd / 3rd Strike: 30 Damage

aspects.name: Spin Attack
aspects.description: Hold Attack to charge; release to Spin Attack.
aspects.damage:
1st Charge: 30 Damage

2nd Charge: 50 Damage

Max Charge: 100 Damage

aspects.name: Throw
aspects.description: Press Special to Throw. After thrown, press Special or Attack to recall.
aspects.notes:
• Range of throw: 850
  • Zagreus cannot Attack before the spear is recalled

upgrades.name: Combo
upgrades.description:
Press Attack > Attack > Attack for Combo. There's a brief pause before each strike.

Pause before each 3rd strike is longer.

* Dashes can be performed between the Attack inputs without interrupting the combo
upgrades.damage:
1st strike: 40 Damage

2nd strike: 60 Damage 3rd strike: 100 Damage

upgrades.name: Serpent Slash
upgrades.description: Hold Attack to charge. Release Attack to send out a spinning blade that moves forward.
upgrades.damage:
1st charge: 20 Damage / 0.5s

2nd charge: 30 Damage / 0.5s

Max charge: 50 Damage / 0.5s
upgrades.effects:
• Heals Zagreus 1 / hit
  • Spinning blade bounces off walls and pillars, pierce

upgrades.name: Crackling Skewer
upgrades.description: Press Special button to throw an irretrievable firework in a straight line.
